sentences.en: A host of problems may delay the opening of the Channel Tunnel.
sentences.cn: 可能推迟英吉利海峡隧道开通的问题一大筐。

sentences.en: Dieppe has plenty to attract cross-Channel visitors.
sentences.cn: 迪耶普有很多浏览胜地，吸引游客横渡英吉利海峡前来观光。

sentences.en: He changed channels to watch the basketball game.
sentences.cn: 他转换频道看篮球比赛。

sentences.en: He was helping wire up the Channel Tunnel last season.
sentences.cn: 他上一季在协助英吉利海峡隧道的电缆铺设工作.

sentences.en: I only get Channel 7.
sentences.cn: 我只能收看到第7频道。

sentences.en: Let'sswitch over to Channel 4.
sentences.cn: 换到4频道吧。

sentences.en: She had heard the news-flash on a TV channel's news update.
sentences.cn: 她在一家电视台的新闻快讯中听到了这则简明新闻。

sentences.en: St George’s Channel
sentences.cn: 圣乔治海峡

sentences.en: the Anglo-French consortium that built the Channel Tunnel
sentences.cn: 修建英吉利海峡隧道的英法财团

sentences.en: The captain sailed his ship through the narrow channel.
sentences.cn: 船长驾驶他的船穿过了狭窄的航道.

sentences.en: The channel is only available on cable.
sentences.cn: 这个频道只有有线电视才能收看。

sentences.en: The Channel Tunnel project is the biggest civil engineering project in Europe.
sentences.cn: 英吉利海峡隧道是欧洲最大的土木工程。

sentences.en: The Channel tunnel was due to open towards the end of 1993.
sentences.cn: 海峡隧道预计1993年年底前开通。

sentences.en: the cross-channel ferry service
sentences.cn: 横渡海峡轮渡服务

sentences.en: The kids are watching cartoons on the Disney Channel.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在看迪士尼频道的卡通片。

sentences.en: The new software will be sold through existing distribution channels
sentences.cn: 新的软件将通过现有的经销渠道销售。

sentences.en: the news on Channel 4
sentences.cn: 第四频道播出的新闻

sentences.en: The series goes out at 10.30pm, Fridays, on Channel 4.
sentences.cn: 这部连续剧每周五晚上10点30分在第4频道播出。

sentences.en: The ship went through the busy shipping lanes of the English Channel.
sentences.cn: 这艘轮船通过了繁忙的英吉利海峡船运航线.

sentences.en: Water had channelled grooves in the rock.
sentences.cn: 水在岩石上冲出了沟槽。

sentences.en: What channel is ‘ER’ on?
sentences.cn: 《仁心仁术》在哪个频道播放？

sentences.en: What's on Channel 4 tonight?
sentences.cn: 电视四台今晚有什么节目？

words.tran_cn: 开辟水道或沟渠；疏导；通道化

phrases.tran_cn: 通道容量；通路的频带宽度

trans.tran_cn: （电视）频道，波段，渠道，方法，沟渠，航道，海峡
trans.tran_en: a television station and all the programmes that it broadcasts

trans.tran_cn: 将(精力或情感)专注于，输送（资金）
trans.tran_en: to control and direct something such as money or energy towards a particular purpose
